targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  d.deployment,
  i.name,
  d.failed,
  d.latest_ethereum_block_number,
  d.entity_count,
  d.reorg_count,
  d.current_reorg_depth,
  d.max_reorg_depth,
  d.health,
  d.synced_at
FROM subgraphs.subgraph_deployment d
JOIN info.subgraph_info i ON i.subgraph = d.deployment
ORDER BY d.deployment DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT
  e.subgraph_id,
  i.name,
  e.message,
  e.block_range,
  e.deterministic,
  e.created_at
FROM subgraphs.subgraph_error e
JOIN info.subgraph_info i ON i.subgraph = e.subgraph_id
ORDER BY e.created_at DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT
  d.deployment,
  i.name,
  d.failed,
  d.latest_ethereum_block_number,
  d.entity_count,
  d.reorg_count,
  d.current_reorg_depth,
  d.max_reorg_depth,
  d.health,
  d.synced_at
FROM subgraphs.subgraph_deployment d
JOIN info.subgraph_info i ON i.subgraph = d.deployment
ORDER BY d.deployment DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT
  e.subgraph_id,
  i.name,
  e.message,
  e.block_range,
  e.deterministic,
  e.created_at
FROM subgraphs.subgraph_error e
JOIN info.subgraph_info i ON i.subgraph = e.subgraph_id
ORDER BY e.created_at DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT
  d.deployment,
  i.name,
  d.failed,
  d.latest_ethereum_block_number,
  d.entity_count,
  d.reorg_count,
  d.current_reorg_depth,
  d.max_reorg_depth,
  d.health,
  d.synced_at
FROM subgraphs.subgraph_deployment d
JOIN info.subgraph_info i ON i.subgraph = d.deployment
ORDER BY d.deployment DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT
  e.subgraph_id,
  i.name,
  e.message,
  e.block_range,
  e.deterministic,
  e.created_at
FROM subgraphs.subgraph_error e
JOIN info.subgraph_info i ON i.subgraph = e.subgraph_id
ORDER BY e.created_at DESC
LIMIT 100;

panels.description: Measures duration of block processing for a subgraph deployment
panels.title: Block Processing Duration

panels.description: Measures duration of trigger processing for a subgraph deployment
panels.title: Trigger Processing Duration

panels.description: Measures the execution time for handlers
panels.title: Handler Execution Time

panels.description: Calculates percentage of syncing progress by subtracting most recent block synced from head block number
panels.title: Syncing Progress

panels.description: Total requests received by eRPC for a specific network and method
panels.title: Network-level Requests

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(erpc_network_request_duration_seconds_bucket[30s])) by (le, job, project, network, category))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_network_request_duration_seconds_bucket[30s])) by (le, job, project, network, category))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(erpc_network_request_duration_seconds_bucket[5m])) by (le, job, project, network, category))

panels.description: When a request fails even after trying all upstreams and retries
panels.title: Network-level Errors

panels.description: These are real requests sent to upstream endpoints, including retries
panels.title: Upstream-level requests

panels.description: These are real requests sent to upstream endpoints, including retries
panels.title: Upstream-level RPS

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(erpc_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{network!="n/a"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, upstream, category))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{network!="n/a"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, upstream, category))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(erpc_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{network!="n/a"}[1m])) by (le, project, network, upstream, category))
sum(increase(erpc_cache_set_success_total[30s])) by (job, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl)
sum(increase(erpc_cache_set_error_total[30s])) by (job, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl)
sum(increase(erpc_cache_get_success_hit_total[30s])) by (job, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl)
sum(increase(erpc_cache_get_success_miss_total[30s])) by (job, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl)
sum(increase(erpc_cache_get_error_total[30s])) by (job, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl)
histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(erpc_cache_get_error_duration_seconds_bucket[30s])) by (le, job, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_cache_get_error_duration_seconds_bucket[30s])) by (le, job, project, network, category, connector, policy, ttl))
